context: Is the hobbit game that comes with this bundle the retail case version of the game or does it come in just a cardboard sleeve?

context: Does this mouse work with Win 8? Having trouble programming G400 buttons?
response: According to Logitech's own website, they completely support your mouse on the Windows 8 platform (source: http://logitech-en-amr.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/32425#Mice)You would program your mouse's macro buttons using the 'Mouse and Keyboard Settings' program that comes with the Logitech drivers package. The program may also be called and titled, 'Logitech SetPoint'.

context: My Xbox 360 4GB will not recognize it. What do I do??

context: Can I just play my games offline and hear game sound on headphones or do I need to play online?

context: Anyone else having wireless issues with this unit?  See my write up on my vita slim green/white.  I'm assuming I got a lemon but would like to hear.
response: Yeah I've had mine for a while too, and haven't encountered any problems with the wireless, however sometimes the joystick becomes unresponsive and moves my character spuratically.

context: I noticed that one reviewer mentioned the battery pack also needs to be purchased. Doesn't this take AA batteries like the old controllers?
response: it takes just 2 AA batteries (included). The battery pack is optional.

context: Is this a single player only game, or can two people plug in and play together?
response: Two people can plug and play it supports guitar bass and microphone. On guitar you can pick rhythm or lead.

context: Would this work with a chromebook?
response: considering that the chrome OS is less of a full function OS and more of a straight-to-internet type...I'm going to say NO...no it will not. A wired controller however would work , you might want to check the youtube video  "chromebook how to connect a xbox/ps3 controller and what games"

context: It is rated T for language.  What words are used that are inappropriate for kids?  Thanks.
response: I think its ok.

context: Is the controller included ?
response: Yes, I think it is.

context: Does the complete edition have all expansion packs included?
response: Yes, The Complete Edition incorporates the expansion packs Gods and Kings and Brave New World in addition to several scenarios.  These are all downloaded from Steam when you do the install.  They are not separately loadable or playable though, just incorporated into the final game version.

context: Loads great, but will not play. What do i need to do to correct?
response: try to unload and and then reload. also you can try to ...first try and start at hard drive .    this is all working on fact that your os  is compat with the game.    other than that check for fingerprint and scratches    possible you got a bum disc.

context: How many gigabytes does it use after I buy the disk and insert into my xbox?
response: Hi. Please note this is a PC game. It Will not work with your Xbox.

context: Does this work with the XBone?
response: They sure do. You need to buy the chat adapter though. This one here: Xbox One Stereo Headset Adapter That's only if you want it to work with chat though. It does work perfectly fine without it, you can just use the kinect for chat if you want to.

context: What language are the dialogues, subtitles, and the game menu?
response: Japanese lenguage , english sub,english menu...

context: I'm sure this is dumb question but, does the mouse change colors?
response: NO it does not change color it just light UP.

context: Does it come with all the power cords, or will i have to get them seprate?
response: yes comes with all the cords

context: I want to play my kinect on my old LCD tv which is 3 inches wide. Does this fit on it?? Does it have enough width so that the back flap works?
response: The back arm that extends has a soft pad and that lays on your TV. But that part moves and pivots that is like a second arm so it makes the range of the arm wider, so yes it can fit a really thick tv

context: After installation, does it require the CD to play?
response: Yes, you do need to have the disk inserted to play. That's really the only bad part about the game, in my opinion.

context: After download the patch to start the program it start but after I hit the play button it turn off or said it can be run. What I need to do to fix it?
response: You need to up date your graphic, then go to www.Kalypso.com To fix the patch. If you have a old computer then sol.

context: dose this keyboard use USB
response: yes it uses usb but not gold plated its just a regular silver looking usb connection

context: Can you use the wireless and 3.5mm simultaneously? For example plugging into your own music device while playing a game.
response: No, but the latest PS4 update allows you to play your own music through the USB slot while gaming, so there's that as an option. I haven't tried it out yet, but it was supposedly released in the last large update.

context: Does it work on Windows 8.1?
response: Yes it does, my nephew has it on his and he has had no problems

context: Will this work with Mac OS X?  Yosemite?
response: It works for me.

context: I've heard that in the Fire Emblem series, there is something called PermaDeath. Is that Permanent Death? If it is, can it be turned off?
response: Yes, permadeath is permanent death. The option to turn off permadeath is actually something unique to this particular fire emblem game. Previous fire emblem games don't have this option.

context: On Turtle Beach website it says it's compatible with XBOX One via the earforce headset adapter. Are you sure it's not compatible?
response: It is compatible. I am using it after receiving it for Christmas. You need the adapter for CHAT communication, otherwise, it will still work for sound.

context: Does this game sold from the Official Amazon, will it include ALL Discs and DLC Codes? Alot of people have been complaining about missing games.
response: We have this game includes all discs however the codes may have been redeemed already. Thank you.
Yes, I use it with 220V and work very well!!

context: Is the wrist rest removable?
response: Yes, two large-headed screws on either end. You can use a flat-head or your fingers

context: Can you use the wireless and 3.5mm simultaneously? For example plugging into your own music device while playing a game.
response: you can buy an astro gaming mix amp for that.

context: Does it have a Yaw capability?
response: I only played this stick with the game " War Thunder" I could find nothing this stick could not do.  It is pretty easy to program as well.

context: i want to get bo2 on pc but if i get it in physical form will this come in a code so i can download it since my pc doesnt have a dvd writer/reader
response: There is two ways one u have to buy it from steam and download it or u can buy a dvd of that game and use some one elses pc to copy every file from that dvd and get ghose on a different flash drive and transfer it to u r pc.

context: Do you realy need the balance board?
response: Yes.  Only the yoga is done without it.  All the other games require it.

context: I read that others supply 4CDs with this software. it so with this offer?
response: Mine came with 4 CDs.

context: what is the difference between a wii and a wii mini?
response: Wii mini only plays wii disks.  It does not have Internet access.

context: i have a k70 and a buddy is trading it from me for a k90, should i do it ? is mine better ?
response: Not sure if the 90 is better,  however my oldest son has the k70, and I have the k95.  The only complaint I have is the led stopped working on my u key. And the cap locks is very sensitive.

context: Where is it manufactured?  Does it come with a charger and stylus?
response: taiwan yes and yes

context: How long is the USB cord?
response: I'm not sure about imperial units,  but it felt like 1.5 -2 meters. it's long,  even for a corded controller.

context: Is there a way to mute my mic? I'm thinking of matching this mixamp with Audio Technica's ATHADG1 which requires you to hold the mute button closed.
response: There is no mute button on the mixamp its self. I own a pair of A40s and the mute button is on the cord of the the headset.

context: does this bring athena hades and poseidon
response: Yes, they can be used as playable characters

context: How many controllers come with this listing and are ALL cables included?
response: One controller. Yes, all cables are included. enjoy

context: About how long is the battery life (those of you who got actually functioning units)? Does it compare to the WiiU Pro's 50+ hours?
response: Sorry. I really can't give you a good answer. The first one I bought was broken. I have a new one, I charged it and now it works. I've used it several times and haven't had to recharge.
